耠字的基本解释

耠
huō
一种翻土使松的农具，可以代替犁锄等：耠子。犁耠。锄耠。
用耠子翻土：耠土。耠地。

耠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huō］
［《廣韻》侯閤切，入合，匣。］
亦作“秴1”。
耠子。亦指用耠子松土。

耠字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【耒字部】　耠； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页963第13
【廣韻】?閤切【集韻】曷閤切，?音合。【博雅】耠，耕也。

耠
Basic explanation of words
耠
huō
A farm tool that plows the soil to loosen the soil and can replace plows and hoes: columbine. Plough. Hoe.
Turn the soil with Columbine: Columbine soil. Hudi.
耠
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [huō]
["Guangyun" Hou He cuts, enters, and box. ]
Also known as "秴1".
Columbine. Also refers to loosening the soil with columbine.
耠

[Not concentrated] [Lei word department] 　耠; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 963 13
[Guang Yun]? He cuts [Ji Yun] He cuts together, and sounds together. 【Bo Ya】耠, farming also.
